nodes.text: A clan of Nikto was in servitude to the Hutt Cartel for twelve generations by the time of the Hutts' Conquest of Makeb in 3638 BBY. Members of the clan who served as Khobisho the Hutt's bodyguards were known to keep formidable pets, including exoboar attack hounds. Under Kobisho, Niktos also worked alongside Rodians who wielded electroblades.

When Kobisho gathered with fellow Cartel members Prodoranya and Manju at Solida Hesk's resort on Makeb, Kobisho's Nikto and Rodian forces acted as the resort's security alongside Solida Hesk's droids, Prodoranya's enforcers and bio-enhanced kintans, as well as Manju's elite slavers.
